All-in-One integrated marketing platform: Plataforma integrada de marketing todo en uno para la gestión de audiencias, el envío de campañas, el seguimiento del compromiso y la automatización del ciclo de vida.
Add a new subscriber to an audience or u: Añadir un nuevo suscriptor a un público o actualizar el suscriptor existente
Add a note to a subscriber in your Mailc: Añade una nota a un suscriptor en tu audiencia de correo electrónico.
Add a subscriber to a specific tag in yo: Añade un suscriptor a una etiqueta específica en tu audiencia de correo electrónico.
Remove a subscriber from a specific tag: Elimina un suscriptor de una etiqueta específica en tu audiencia de correo.
Update a member in an existing Mailchimp: Actualizar un miembro en una audiencia de correo existente (lista)
Create a new Mailchimp campaign: Crear una nueva campaña de correo electrónico
Get comprehensive report details for a s: Obtener detalles completos del informe para una campaña enviada específica, incluyendo aperturas, clics, rebotes y métricas de rendimiento
Create a new audience (list) in your Mai: Crea una nueva audiencia (lista) en tu cuenta de correo electrónico
Unsubscribe an email address from an aud: Darse de baja de una dirección de correo electrónico a un público
Search all campaigns for the specified q: Buscar en todas las campañas los términos de consulta especificados
Find a customer by email address in a st: Encontrar un cliente por correo electrónico en una tienda
Search for tags on a list by name: Buscar etiquetas en una lista por nombre
Search for subscribers across all lists: Buscar suscriptores en todas las listas o dentro de una lista específica. Esta acción proporciona información completa de suscriptores, incluyendo campos de fusión, intereses y datos de actividad.
Audience you want to add the contact to: Audiencia a la que quieres añadir el contacto
Type of email this member wants to recei: Type of email this member wants to receive
Accept member data without merge field v: Accept member data without merge field values even if required
The email address of the subscriber to a: The email address of the subscriber to add a note to
The note content to add to the subscribe: The note content to add to the subscriber
The email address of the subscriber to a: The email address of the subscriber to add to the tag
The name of the tag to add the subscribe: The name of the tag to add the subscriber to
The email address of the subscriber to r: The email address of the subscriber to remove from the tag
The name of the tag to remove the subscr: The name of the tag to remove the subscriber from
The type of campaign to create: The type of campaign to create
The subject line for the campaign: The subject line for the campaign
The name that will appear in the \"From\: The name that will appear in the "From" field
The email address that will appear in th: The email address that will appear in the "From" field
The email address that will receive repl: The email address that will receive replies
The name that will appear in the \"To\": The name that will appear in the "To" field (e.g., *|FNAME|*)
How the campaign content is put together: How the campaign content is put together
The URL where the campaign content is ho: The URL where the campaign content is hosted (required if content_type is "url")
The ID of the template to use (required: The ID of the template to use (required if content_type is "template")
The HTML content for the campaign (requi: The HTML content for the campaign (required if content_type is "html")
Select the campaign to get information f: Select the campaign to get information for
Comma-separated list of fields to return: Comma-separated list of fields to return (e.g., "opens.unique_opens,clicks.click_rate")
Comma-separated list of fields to exclud: Comma-separated list of fields to exclude (e.g., "timeseries,_links")
Company name for list contact informatio: Company name for list contact information
Street address for list contact informat: Street address for list contact information
State or province for list contact infor: State or province for list contact information
ZIP or postal code for list contact info: ZIP or postal code for list contact information
Phone number for list contact informatio: Phone number for list contact information (optional)
The permission reminder for the list: The permission reminder for the list
Default from email address for campaigns: Default from email address for campaigns
Whether the list supports multiple email: Whether the list supports multiple email formats (HTML/plain text)
Whether campaigns use the Archive Bar in: Whether campaigns use the Archive Bar in archives by default
Email address to send subscribe notifica: Email address to send subscribe notifications to (optional)
Email address to send unsubscribe notifi: Email address to send unsubscribe notifications to (optional)
Whether to require subscriber confirmati: Whether to require subscriber confirmation via email
Whether the list has marketing permissio: Whether the list has marketing permissions (GDPR) enabled
MD5 hash of the lowercase email address,: MD5 hash of the lowercase email address, email address, or contact_id
Comma-separated list of fields to return: Comma-separated list of fields to return
Comma-separated list of fields to exclud: Comma-separated list of fields to exclude
Number of records to skip for pagination: Number of records to skip for pagination
Search query to filter tags (optional -: Search query to filter tags (optional - if empty, returns all tags)
Email address of the subscriber to searc: Email address of the subscriber to search for
Fields to include in the response (leave: Fields to include in the response (leave empty for all fields). Use dot notation for nested fields (e.g., "merge_fields.FNAME")
Fields to exclude from the response. Use: Fields to exclude from the response. Use dot notation for nested fields
Fires when a new subscriber joins your M: Fires when a new subscriber joins your Mailchimp audience. This trigger captures new subscriptions, opt-ins, and audience growth events with comprehensive subscriber information.
Fires when a subscriber unsubscribes fro: Fires when a subscriber unsubscribes from your Mailchimp audience. This trigger captures unsubscribe events, opt-outs, and audience churn with comprehensive subscriber information for retention analysis.
Fires when a new campaign is created or: Fires when a new campaign is created or sent
Fires when a recipient clicks a specifie: Fires when a recipient clicks a specified link in a campaign
Fires when a recipient opens a an email: Fires when a recipient opens a an email in a specific campaign
Fires when a subscriber profile is updat: Fires when a subscriber profile is updated, including changes to merge fields, interests, or contact information. This trigger captures profile updates, new subscriptions, and subscriber modifications.
Fires when a new customer is added to a: Fires when a new customer is added to a connected store
Fires when a new order is created in the: Fires when a new order is created in the connected store
Fires when a subscriber joins a specific: Fires when a subscriber joins a specific segment or tag
The specific segment ID to monitor. Leav: The specific segment ID to monitor. Leave empty to monitor all segments.
The specific tag name to monitor. Leave: The specific tag name to monitor. Leave empty to monitor all tags.
